effect.Name: Sharpness (Switch)
effect.description: This shader gives the effect of "Sharpness" by detecting edges and giving sharpening to them.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Sharpness (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (08.08.2024) */
parameter.description: This shader gives the effect of "Sharpness" by detecting edges and giving sharpening to them.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines what the base should be. Setting it to 0 sets the base as the texture of the object on which the effect is applied, and setting it to 1 sets this as the background.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Sharpness Size
parameter.description: This variable determines the distance of the sharpness size.
